Row.Text: Cultural Attribute Skills
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age on the Palace and City Halls.
+10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:WONDER] Wonders.
+25% [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture towards studying [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic Masteries.
+5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with at least 1 [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in Settlements for each [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age from [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Works on display.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists, or +2 if you have 3 or fewer [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+10 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age for every [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance you have.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns, or +2 in Distant Lands.
+5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age. Repeatable.
Diplomatic Attribute Skills
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age on the Palace and City Halls.
+1[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence per Age on the Palace.
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements for each [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.
+50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating and progressing the [icon:PROJECT] Befriend Independent Project.
+25% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards supporting or rejecting [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Diplomatic Actions.
+50% [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration length.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age for each [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_TRADITION_SLOT] Social Policy slot.
Unlock the [icon:ESPIONAGE] Military Sabotage Espionage Action.
+3[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence and +5[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age. Repeatable.
Economic Attribute Skills
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per Age on the Palace and City Halls.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per Age for every active [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Tech and [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic Mastery completed in an Age.
+1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every imported [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource.
+15%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing in all Settlements.
+1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns, or +2 in Towns in Distant Lands.
+1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities, or +2 if you have 3 or fewer [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+10 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per Age for every [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance you have.
+1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
+5 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per Age. Repeatable.
Expansionist Attribute Skills
+25% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training [icon:UNIT_SETTLER] Settlers.
+5% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per Age on [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse Buildings.
15% of [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food is refunded when a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City grows by adding a [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialist.
Gain +1 [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns. New [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns start with an additional [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population.
+10% [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards maintaining [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists, or +20% if you have 3 or fewer [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+15% Yields in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns with a Specialization, or +30% in Distant Lands.
+1 [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialist Limit in all [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities, -1 [icon:SETTLEMENT_LIMIT] Settlement Limit.
+1 [icon:SETTLEMENT_LIMIT] Settlement Limit.
+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities per [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Town you own. Repeatable.
Militaristic Attribute Skills
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against [icon:INDEPENDENT_POWER] Independent Powers and [icon:CITYSTATE] City-States.
Gain 1 [icon:WAR_SUPPORT] War Support on all your [icon:WAR] Wars.
+50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards Levying Units from [icon:CITYSTATE] City-States.
+15%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Military Units.
Ignore the [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness penalty from [icon:YIELD_ANGRY] Unrest in captured Settlements.
Garrisoned [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders reduce [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness penalties by an additional 10%.
-1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for all Units.
+1 [icon:SETTLEMENT_LIMIT] Settlement Limit.
[icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders gain a free [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level. New [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders start with a free [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level.
Units gain +2 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing. Repeatable.
Scientific Attribute Skills
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age on the Palace and City Halls.
+15% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings.
+25% [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science towards researching [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Tech Masteries.
+20% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards maintaining [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings.
+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in Settlements for each [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.
+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on each [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarter.
+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists, or +2 if you have 3 or fewer [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+10[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age for every [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance you have.
+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns, or +2 in Distant Lands.
+5 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age. Repeatable.
Legend Unlock.
+15% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings and [icon:WONDER] Wonders with [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Works slots.
